trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for both <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"></xref> and <xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Gir basisklassen for begge <xref href="System.IO.FileInfo"> </xref> og <xref href="System.IO.DirectoryInfo"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemInfo"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: En liste over vanlige oppgaver i i/u, kan du se [vanlige oppgaver i i/u](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemInfo"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemInfo"> </xref> klasse serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: En liste over vanlige oppgaver i i/u, kan du se [vanlige oppgaver i i/u](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> som inneholder den serialiserte objektdata om som oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>som inneholder kontekstavhengig informasjon om kilden eller målet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> is null.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> er null.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the attributes for the current file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir attributtene for den gjeldende filen eller mappen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Attributes property is pre-cached if the current instance of the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> object was returned from any of the following <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> methods: - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> To get the latest value, call the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen attributter er hurtigbufrede hvis den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>objektet ble returnert fra følgende <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>metoder:- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A>for å få den nyeste verdien Ring den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is a combination of the archive, compressed, directory, hidden, offline, read-only, system, and temporary file attribute flags.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen er en kombinasjon av arkivet komprimert, katalogen skjult, frakoblet, skrivebeskyttet, systemet og midlertidige filen attributtet flagg.

trans-unit.source: When you set this value, use the bitwise OR operator (`|` in C# or `Or` in Visual Basic) to apply more than one value.
trans-unit.target: Når du setter denne verdien, kan du bruke bitvis OR-operatoren (`|` i C# eller `Or` i Visual Basic) til å bruke mer enn én verdi.

trans-unit.source: To retain any existing values in the Attributes property, include the value of the Attributes property in your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde eksisterende verdier i egenskapen attributter, Inkluder verdien for egenskapen attributter i din tilordningen.

trans-unit.source: For example: `exampleFile.Attributes = exampleFile.Attributes | FileAttributes.ReadOnly;`
trans-unit.target: For eksempel:`exampleFile.Attributes = exampleFile.Attributes | FileAttributes.ReadOnly;`

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.IO.FileAttributes"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IO.FileAttributes"></xref>av gjeldende <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte filen finnes ikke.

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid; for example, it is on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte banen er ugyldig. Det er for eksempel på en lokal stasjon.

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren har ikke den nødvendige tillatelsen.

trans-unit.source: The caller attempts to set an invalid file attribute.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren prøver å angi en ugyldig filattributt.

trans-unit.source: -or- The user attempts to set an attribute value but does not have write permission.
trans-unit.target: - eller - brukeren prøver å angi en attributtverdi, men har ikke skrivetillatelse.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*> cannot initialize the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>kan ikke initialisere dataene.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the creation time of the current file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tidspunkt for opprettelse av den gjeldende filen eller mappen.

trans-unit.source: **Note** This method may return an inaccurate value, because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** denne metoden kan returnere en unøyaktig verdi fordi den bruker opprinnelige funksjoner med verdier ikke kan oppdateres kontinuerlig av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The value of the CreationTime property is pre-cached if the current instance of the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> object was returned from any of the following <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> methods: - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> To get the latest value, call the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen CreationTime er hurtigbufrede hvis den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>objektet ble returnert fra følgende <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>metoder:- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A>for å få den nyeste verdien Ring den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>

trans-unit.source: If the file described in the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> object does not exist, this property will return 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: Hvis filen som beskrives i <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>objektet finnes ikke, denne egenskapen, returneres 12:00 midnatt januar 1, 1601 e.kr.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time.
trans-unit.target: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), justeres til lokal tid.

trans-unit.source: NTFS-formatted drives may cache file meta-info, such as file creation time, for a short period of time.
trans-unit.target: NTFS-formaterte stasjoner kan bufre metadata-Filinformasjon, for eksempel filen oppretting tid, for en kort periode.

trans-unit.source: This process is known as file tunneling.
trans-unit.target: Denne prosessen kalles filen tunnelering.

trans-unit.source: As a result, it may be necessary to explicitly set the creation time of a file if you are overwriting or replacing an existing file.
trans-unit.target: Det kan derfor være nødvendig å eksplisitt angi tidspunkt for opprettelse av en fil hvis du overskriving eller erstatte et eksisterende fil.

trans-unit.source: This property value is `null` if the file system containing the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> object does not support this information.
trans-unit.target: En verdi for denne egenskapen er `null` Hvis filen system som inneholder den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>objektet støtter ikke denne informasjonen.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>

trans-unit.source: The creation date and time of the current <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Av opprettingsdatoen og klokkeslettet for gjeldende <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemInfo"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*> cannot initialize the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>kan ikke initialisere dataene.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid; for example, it is on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte banen er ugyldig. Det er for eksempel på en lokal stasjon.

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: Det gjeldende operativsystemet er ikke Windows NT eller senere.

trans-unit.source: The caller attempts to set an invalid creation time.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren prøver å angi en ugyldig oppretting tid.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the creation time, in coordinated universal time (UTC), of the current file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir oppretting tiden, i coordinated universal time (UTC) for den gjeldende filen eller mappen.

trans-unit.source: **Note** This method may return an inaccurate value, because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** denne metoden kan returnere en unøyaktig verdi fordi den bruker opprinnelige funksjoner med verdier ikke kan oppdateres kontinuerlig av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The value of the CreationTimeUtc property is pre-cached if the current instance of the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> object was returned from any of the following <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> methods: - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> To get the latest value, call the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen CreationTimeUtc er hurtigbufrede hvis den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>objektet ble returnert fra følgende <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>metoder:- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A>for å få den nyeste verdien Ring den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>

trans-unit.source: If the file described in the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> object does not exist, this property will return 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: Hvis filen som beskrives i <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>objektet finnes ikke, denne egenskapen, returneres 12:00 midnatt januar 1, 1601 e.kr.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

trans-unit.source: NTFS-formatted drives may cache file meta-info, such as file creation time, for a short period of time.
trans-unit.target: NTFS-formaterte stasjoner kan bufre metadata-Filinformasjon, for eksempel filen oppretting tid, for en kort periode.

trans-unit.source: This process is known as file tunneling.
trans-unit.target: Denne prosessen kalles filen tunnelering.

trans-unit.source: As a result, it may be necessary to explicitly set the creation time of a file if you are overwriting or replacing an existing file.
trans-unit.target: Det kan derfor være nødvendig å eksplisitt angi tidspunkt for opprettelse av en fil hvis du overskriving eller erstatte et eksisterende fil.

trans-unit.source: This property value is `null` if the file system containing the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> object does not support this information.
trans-unit.target: En verdi for denne egenskapen er `null` Hvis filen system som inneholder den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>objektet støtter ikke denne informasjonen.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>

trans-unit.source: The creation date and time in UTC format of the current <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Av Opprettingsdato og klokkeslett i UTC-format for gjeldende <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemInfo"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*> cannot initialize the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>kan ikke initialisere dataene.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid; for example, it is on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte banen er ugyldig. Det er for eksempel på en lokal stasjon.

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: Det gjeldende operativsystemet er ikke Windows NT eller senere.

trans-unit.source: The caller attempts to set an invalid access time.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren prøver å angi en ugyldig verdi for tidspunkt tilgang.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Sletter en fil eller mappe.

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid; for example, it is on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte banen er ugyldig. Det er for eksempel på en lokal stasjon.

trans-unit.source: There is an open handle on the file or directory, and the operating system is Windows XP or earlier.
trans-unit.target: Det er en åpen referanse på filen eller mappen, og operativsystemet Windows XP eller tidligere.

trans-unit.source: This open handle can result from enumerating directories and files.
trans-unit.target: Denne åpen referanse kan oppstå fra opplisting av mapper og filer.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Enumerate Directories and Files](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [slik: liste mapper og filer som](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the file or directory exists.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om filen eller katalogen finnes.

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: En liste over vanlige oppgaver i i/u, kan du se [vanlige oppgaver i i/u](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the file or directory exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis filen eller katalogen finnes. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string representing the extension part of the file.
trans-unit.target: Henter en streng som representerer filtypen-delen av filen.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemInfo"></xref> extension.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder den <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemInfo"> </xref> filtypen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the full path of the directory or file.
trans-unit.target: Henter den fullstendige banen til mappen eller filen.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the full path.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder den fullstendige banen.

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified path and file name is 260 or more characters.
trans-unit.target: Den fullstendige banen og filnavnet er 260 eller flere tegn.

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren har ikke den nødvendige tillatelsen.

trans-unit.source: Represents the fully qualified path of the directory or file.
trans-unit.target: Representerer den fullstendige banen til mappen eller filen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified path is 260 or more characters.
trans-unit.target: Den fullstendige banen er 260 eller flere tegn.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the file name and additional exception information.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objekt med navnet og for mer unntaksinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: En liste over vanlige oppgaver i i/u, kan du se [vanlige oppgaver i i/u](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> som inneholder den serialiserte objektdata om som oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>som inneholder kontekstavhengig informasjon om kilden eller målet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time the current file or directory was last accessed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tiden den gjeldende filen eller mappen sist ble åpnet.

trans-unit.source: **Note** This method may return an inaccurate value, because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** denne metoden kan returnere en unøyaktig verdi fordi den bruker opprinnelige funksjoner med verdier ikke kan oppdateres kontinuerlig av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: If the file described in the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> object does not exist, this property will return 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: Hvis filen som beskrives i <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>objektet finnes ikke, denne egenskapen, returneres 12:00 midnatt januar 1, 1601 e.kr.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time.
trans-unit.target: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), justeres til lokal tid.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTimeUtc%2A> property is pre-cached if the current instance of the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> object was returned from any of the following <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> methods: - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> To get the latest value, call the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTimeUtc%2A>egenskapen er hurtigbufrede hvis den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>objektet ble returnert fra følgende <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>metoder:- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A>for å få den nyeste verdien Ring den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.LastAccessTimeUtc%2A>

trans-unit.source: The time that the current file or directory was last accessed.
trans-unit.target: Tidspunktet da den gjeldende filen eller mappen ble sist åpnet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*> cannot initialize the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>kan ikke initialisere dataene.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: Det gjeldende operativsystemet er ikke Windows NT eller senere.

trans-unit.source: The caller attempts to set an invalid access time
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren prøver å angi en ugyldig verdi for tidspunkt tilgang

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time, in coordinated universal time (UTC), that the current file or directory was last accessed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tiden, i coordinated universal time (UTC), at den gjeldende filen eller mappen sist ble åpnet.

trans-unit.source: **Note** This method may return an inaccurate value, because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** denne metoden kan returnere en unøyaktig verdi fordi den bruker opprinnelige funksjoner med verdier ikke kan oppdateres kontinuerlig av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The value of the LastAccessTimeUtc property is pre-cached if the current instance of the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> object was returned from any of the following <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> methods: - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> To get the latest value, call the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen LastAccessTimeUtc er hurtigbufrede hvis den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>objektet ble returnert fra følgende <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>metoder:- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A>for å få den nyeste verdien Ring den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>

trans-unit.source: If the file described in the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> object does not exist, this property will return 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: Hvis filen som beskrives i <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>objektet finnes ikke, denne egenskapen, returneres 12:00 midnatt januar 1, 1601 e.kr.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: En liste over vanlige oppgaver i i/u, kan du se [vanlige oppgaver i i/u](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The UTC time that the current file or directory was last accessed.
trans-unit.target: UTC-tid som gjeldende filen eller mappen ble sist åpnet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*> cannot initialize the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>kan ikke initialisere dataene.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: Det gjeldende operativsystemet er ikke Windows NT eller senere.

trans-unit.source: The caller attempts to set an invalid access time.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren prøver å angi en ugyldig verdi for tidspunkt tilgang.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time when the current file or directory was last written to.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tidspunktet når gjeldende filen eller mappen ble sist skrevet til.

trans-unit.source: **Note** This method may return an inaccurate value, because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** denne metoden kan returnere en unøyaktig verdi fordi den bruker opprinnelige funksjoner med verdier ikke kan oppdateres kontinuerlig av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The value of the LastWriteTime property is pre-cached if the current instance of the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> object was returned from any of the following <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> methods: - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> To get the latest value, call the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen LastWriteTime er hurtigbufrede hvis den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>objektet ble returnert fra følgende <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>metoder:- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A>for å få den nyeste verdien Ring den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>

trans-unit.source: If the file described in the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> object does not exist, this property will return 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: Hvis filen som beskrives i <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>objektet finnes ikke, denne egenskapen, returneres 12:00 midnatt januar 1, 1601 e.kr.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time.
trans-unit.target: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), justeres til lokal tid.

trans-unit.source: This property value is `null` if the file system containing the file does not support this information.
trans-unit.target: En verdi for denne egenskapen er `null` Hvis filsystemet som inneholder filen ikke støtter denne informasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The time the current file was last written.
trans-unit.target: Tidspunktet når filen sist ble skrevet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*> cannot initialize the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>kan ikke initialisere dataene.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: Det gjeldende operativsystemet er ikke Windows NT eller senere.

trans-unit.source: The caller attempts to set an invalid write time.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren prøver å angi en ugyldig skrive nå.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time, in coordinated universal time (UTC), when the current file or directory was last written to.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tiden, i coordinated universal time (UTC), når den gjeldende filen eller mappen sist ble skrevet til.

trans-unit.source: **Note** This method may return an inaccurate value, because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: **Obs** denne metoden kan returnere en unøyaktig verdi fordi den bruker opprinnelige funksjoner med verdier ikke kan oppdateres kontinuerlig av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The value of the LastWriteTimeUtc property is pre-cached if the current instance of the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> object was returned from any of the following <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> methods: - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> - <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> To get the latest value, call the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen LastWriteTimeUtc er hurtigbufrede hvis den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>objektet ble returnert fra følgende <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>metoder:- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A>- <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A>for å få den nyeste verdien Ring den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetFiles%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetDirectories%2A> </xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>

trans-unit.source: If the file described in the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> object does not exist, this property will return 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: Hvis filen som beskrives i <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>objektet finnes ikke, denne egenskapen, returneres 12:00 midnatt januar 1, 1601 e.kr.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

trans-unit.source: This property value is `null` if the file system containing the file does not support this information.
trans-unit.target: En verdi for denne egenskapen er `null` Hvis filsystemet som inneholder filen ikke støtter denne informasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The UTC time when the current file was last written to.
trans-unit.target: UTC-tid når filen sist ble skrevet til.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*> cannot initialize the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>kan ikke initialisere dataene.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo.Refresh*>

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: Det gjeldende operativsystemet er ikke Windows NT eller senere.

trans-unit.source: The caller attempts to set an invalid write time.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren prøver å angi en ugyldig skrive nå.

trans-unit.source: For files, gets the name of the file.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på filen for filer.

trans-unit.source: For directories, gets the name of the last directory in the hierarchy if a hierarchy exists.
trans-unit.target: For mapper, henter navnet på den siste mappen i hierarkiet Hvis det finnes et hierarki.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> property gets the name of the directory.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""> </xref> egenskapen henter navnet på mappen.

trans-unit.source: A string that is the name of the parent directory, the name of the last directory in the hierarchy, or the name of a file, including the file name extension.
trans-unit.target: En streng som er navnet på den overordnede mappen, navnet på den siste mappen i hierarkiet eller navnet på en fil, inkludert filtypen.

trans-unit.source: The path originally specified by the user, whether relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: Banen som opprinnelig ble angitt av brukeren, om relative eller absolutte.

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: En liste over vanlige oppgaver i i/u, kan du se [vanlige oppgaver i i/u](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the state of the object.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer tilstanden for objektet.

trans-unit.source: `FileSystemInfo.Refresh` takes a snapshot of the file from the current file system.
trans-unit.target: `FileSystemInfo.Refresh`tar et øyeblikksbilde av filen fra systemet.

trans-unit.source: `Refresh` cannot correct the underlying file system even if the file system returns incorrect or outdated information.
trans-unit.target: `Refresh`kan ikke løse det underliggende filsystemet selv om filsystemet returnerer informasjon om feil eller foreldet.

trans-unit.source: This can happen on platforms such as Windows 98.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skje på plattformer som Windows 98.

trans-unit.source: Calls must be made to `Refresh` before attempting to get the attribute information, or the information will be outdated.
trans-unit.target: Kall må gjøres til `Refresh` før du prøver å få informasjon om attributt eller informasjonen blir foreldet.

trans-unit.source: A device such as a disk drive is not ready.
trans-unit.target: En enhet som en stasjon er ikke klart.
